nodes.text: LF-R3D was a valet droid who served Lord Sargo VenHalgon.

During the time of the Clone Wars, LF-R3D accompanied VenHalgon when the lord hired the yacht Twilight's Kiss from Cularin Star Tours and went on a vacation in the Cularin system. VenHalgon landed the yacht on the planet Cularin and LF-3RD remained with the ship while VenHalgon and his party went on a hunting expedition. When they failed to return, LF-R3D alerted the Office of Peace and Security and activated an emergency signal aboard the Kiss. The Heroes of Cularin came to the droid's assistance and found VenHalgon. Afterwards, LF-R3D very grateful to the the heroes for their help.
